# DIRTPreconditioner { #deep_tensor.DIRTPreconditioner }

```python
DIRTPreconditioner(self, dirt, mapping: str = 'lower')
```

A preconditioner built using a previously constructed DIRT 
object.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

<code>[**dirt**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} []{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   A previously constructed DIRT object.

<code>[**mapping**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[str](`str`)]{.parameter-annotation} [ = ]{.parameter-default-sep} [\'lower\']{.parameter-default}</code>

:   Whether the transformations associated with the DIRT object are  lower or upper triangular.
